config.ab.title: Ability Configuration
config.ab.help.shift_screens_left_if_rei: Gives more space for REI item display
config.ab.help.use_vanilla_fonts: Use Minecraft font in storage screens
config.ab.help.utb_cat1_rate: Max items transferred each tick;by category 1 universal transport bus
config.ab.help.utb_cat1_import_cooldown: Freqeuncy of transfers for UTB-1 Importer;1 = every tick, 20 = every second;Higher values may protect server performance
block.ab.utb1_intake.desc: Pulls items onto UTB1 carrier from a single block/side.
block.ab.utb1_intake_g: Storage to Bus Adapter, Illuminated - UTB.1
block.ab.utb1_intake_g.desc: Pulls items onto UTB1 carrier from a single block/side.
block.ab.utb1_export.desc: Deposits items from UTB1 carrier into a single block/side.
block.ab.utb1_export_g: Bus to Storage Adapter, Illuminated - UTB.1
block.ab.utb1_export_g.desc: Deposits items from UTB1 carrier into a single block/side.
block.ab.crate.desc: Holds 2048 items in any combination.;NOT compatible with hoppers.
block.ab.hyper_crate.desc: It's bigger on the inside.;NOT compatible with hoppers.
block.ab.creative_crate.desc: For testing.;Will output random items given redstone signal.
block.ab.bin_1x.desc: Holds 2048 of a single item.;Front display & convenient access.
block.ab.bin_2x.desc: Holds 1024 each of two items.;Front display & convenient access.
block.ab.bin_4x.desc: Holds 512 each of four items.;Front display & convenient access.
block.ab.creative_bin_1x.desc: Endless supply of single item.;For testing.
block.ab.creative_bin_2x.desc: Endless supply of two items.;For testing.
block.ab.creative_bin_4x.desc: Endless supply of four items.;For testing.
